presets.title: Default 4.3 Filter settings
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets Filter settings to 4.3 defaults

presets.title: Tinywhoop Filters by LoryRiga
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Filters for 1s 65mm tynywhoops.
WARNING: Preset for 12 poles motors.
WARNING: RPM filter is required. Ensure that DShot Telemetry is working properly!
WARNING: Always check motors temperature when applying new filters.
If motors get hot or make grind noise, reduce the dTerm expo or lower the gyro lowpass cutoff.

presets.title: Default rates
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Default Betaflight rates - ACTUAL
Will be applied for the currently selected rate profile
TPA values are not included
Throttle limit and curve are not included

presets.title: Default 4.3 RC smoothing settings
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets RC Smoothing settings to 4.3 defaults

presets.title: Fast Freestyle Smoothing By Loryriga
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: RC Smoothing settings for fast freestyle flying.

presets.title: Tune defaults for Basic 4.3 TUNES
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets all Basic 4.3 Tune category parameters to defaults
WARNING: Overwrites all settings mentioned below to defaults.  The User cannot retain their previous values.
WARNING: Tune authors must explicitly set these values to something other than default, if needed for the tune.
DOES NOT reset rates, filters, rc_smoothing, and many other parameters.

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Tinywhoop 1s 65mm
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune with filters for 1s 65mm tinywhoops.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
If motors get hot or make grind noise then reduce the dTerm expo, lower the gyro lowpass cutoff or choose a more conservative filter startegy.
WARNING: Preset for 12 poles motors.
WARNING: RPM filter is required. Ensure that DShot Telemetry is working properly!
WARNING: Always check motors temperature when applying new filters.
If motors get hot or make grind noise, reduce the dTerm expo or lower the gyro lowpass cutoff.

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Tinywhoop 1s 65mm NO FILTER
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune for 1s 65mm tynywhoops.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
WARNING: If Dynamic Idle is enabled then Dshot Telemetry must work properly!
WARNING: Preset for 12 poles motors.

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Cinewhoop 2.5inch
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune for 2.5" cinewhoops.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
WARNING: If Dynamic Idle is enabled then Dshot Telemetry must work properly!
WARNING: Preset for 12 poles motors. If 14 poles motors are used please check the dedicated option.

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Cinewhoop 2.5inch VERY CLEAN
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune with filters for VERY CLEAN 2.5" cinewhoops.
Credits to Chris Rosser for the filter startegy used in this tune.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
WARNING: RPM filter is required. Ensure that DShot Telemetry is working properly!
WARNING: This setup have very little filtering and it's intended to be used only on well built quads with a sturdy frame and smooth motors.
Ensure that your props are in mint condition.
If motors get hot or make grind noise then choose a less aggressive filter startegy.
WARNING: Preset for 12 poles motors. If 14 poles motors are used please check the dedicated option.

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Freestyle 5inch
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune for 5" freestyle bulds.
PIDs are based on freestyle quads with high power/weight ratio, hence they're a bit conservative for average builds.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
WARNING: If Dynamic Idle is enabled then Dshot telemetry must work properly!

options.name: F4 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT300)
F7 FC Speed Settings (WARNING: Enables DSHOT600)

presets.title: Freestyle 5inch VERY CLEAN
presets.author: LoryRiga
description: Tune with filters for VERY CLEAN 5" freestyle bulds.
Credits to Chris Rosser for the filter startegy used in this tune.
PIDs are based on freestyle quads with high power/weight ratio, hence they're a bit conservative for average builds.
Raise the master slider to improve the performance if needed.
Lower the master slider if you hear motors thrill, then raise the feedforward to the previous values with the dedicated slider.
WARNING: RPM filter is required. Ensure that DShot Telemetry is working properly!
WARNING: This setup have very little filtering and it's intended to be used only on well built quads with a sturdy frame and smooth motors.
Ensure that your props are in mint condition.
If motors get hot or make grind noise then choose a less aggressive filter startegy.
